National_City.Moreton Bay fig (Balboa Park):
The Moreton Bay fig in San Diego's Balboa Park is one of the largest trees in the U.S. state of California.


== History ==
It began its life when it was planted in 1914. During the Panama–California Exposition it was part of the San Diego County garden exhibit; as of 2017 it is the last remaining plant from the exhibit.
